marklogic.body:
I'm a devoted atheist myself, but there are simply some gaps science and rationality canot fill for many people who are compelled to order their universe from front to back as simply as they can. religion has filled that gap for many in addition to being a cynical tool for social control.
For a culture bent on privatizing everything, the one thing we most need privatized--religion--is the one thing we're not doing well enough.
on a lighter note, these euphoric rushes of religious hysteria Always Burn themselves out, with or without mass casualties. of all the social systems ever devised, the shortest in longevity--aside from democracy...:) --is usually theocracy. As a tributary system of rule, it's pretty lame.
